my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat seekor angsa di kolam itu yang mahu makan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Yeay! Terima kasih, @user kerana memberi angsa makan. Kini kita telah jumpa huruf hijaiyah kita yang kedua!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Oh, it's a goose in the pond.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Hey @user, can you help feed the goose?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Masha Allah, that goose is pretty.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It also looks like the second Hijaiyah letter for this path...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Great work, @user. That was a good find.
